Articles.Content:
Is there a memory sink in kerbal space programme only when using it for 3 to 4 hours it really slows down, the machine I use has extremely high spec and 32 gigs of RAM with M.2 drives when looking at the resources the memory doesn't seem to be that high a couple of gig's so could it be the sink is to do with video memory the video card in use is a NVIDIA 1080 with 8 gig of RAM it's only a thought it's not that much of a problem as all I do is reset the machine every couple of hours I just thought you ought to know.

Thanks for any suggestions.

@Lankspace What version of KSP are you running? There was a pretty big memory leak in 1.5 and prior which was fixed in version 1.6.

Edited March 19, 2019 by RealKerbal3x

Hello using version 1.6.1.2401

Did think it could be Machine. i.e Virus or spyware But no this is not it. So at a bit of a loss. Would it help if i posted DXDIAG.TXT ?

 

 

Edited March 19, 2019 by Lankspace
